tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very nice doctor .

I met him in his clinic for my maid who had fracture in her ankle , as in another hospital we were advised to get surgery done. Somehow we managed to go Dr. Khanna by our friend reference who told us to visit there .

The doctor explain everything in very simple way by making diagram and assure us that we will do it in plaster cast only and it will be healed . Now one day has passed and there is no pain in wrist, hope everything will be fine .

Thanks a lot for Dr Khanna for guiding us.üôèüèª

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Vikram is very polite and listened to my issue very well. I had visited for joint pain . He advised a course for 1 month..hopefully the pain will go. Overall good experience till now.

review: After talking to multiple Doctors we met Dr Vikram Khanna. He has taken good care of my wife, post surgery follow ups were also good. The kind of satisfaction in terms of advice and availability provided by Dr Vikram and his staff Ranvijay, Khushboo and Sanju has been amazing.

review: Overall experience was excellent. The staff are well mannered and patient. Xray and blood tests are available. The doctor (Dr Khanna) is amazing and has good knowledge on the subject matter and he is definitely one of the best doctors I have come across.

tags: None
review:
I was suffering From Joints pain and spine pain since long time.I had even consulted many senior doctors but I wad getting temporary relief every time.
But Dr. Vikram Khanna listened to my problem very carefully and gave me adequate time and best thing is he also advise good sitting and working postures with minimum medicines.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words and encouragement. Get well soon.

tags: None
review: I have visited Dr. Vikram Khanna with a problem of lower backache. He listens to you attentively & completely & then suggests you the best. He gives adequate consultation time till the patient is satisfied. Also all the services like medicines, investigations, physiotherapy, X-ray etc are available under one roof.  Also the staff is very helpful.
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words and encouragement. Get well soon.

review:
I saw Dr Khanna for a knee issue. He was very patient in listening to me, and after an examination guided me to the best course of action for my condition. 

I appreciated his attention to detail and how thorough he was with explaining what was going to be my plan for recovery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review:
Our experience in Sparsh Hospital was excellent. Dr. Vikram Khanna takes good care of his patient. My mother underwent surgery and she is above seventy due to which i was really scared, but Dr. Vikram's words of assurance allayed my fears and the surgery went off well. His staff is also very competent. They kept us updated with every smallest of details. After surgery time to time Dr. Vikram kept tab on the progress of the patient.

Thank you doc. God bless you and your team

review: I came to Dr. Vikram Khanna 2 months after getting burned over the little finger. I couldnt straighten my little finger. he very patiently explained the surgery and answered all the queries which I had. about a month back he operated on my little finger. I have come to thank him as the treatment is now complete and I am able to straighten and move my little finger. Thankyou and god bless.

tags: None
review:
** ****** ****** ** * **** ************* *** ******* *************** I had pain  in my knees for last 2 months.  I visited many consultants before but they could not diagnose the problem and i was on constant pain killers. Dr Vikram khanna not only listened to my problem carefully but he is the one who diagnosed  that i had some type of arthritis.  With his treatment after two months  i am pain-free.
we need more doctors like him.
